items.title: Thoma Bravo Reportedly Nears Deal for Boeing?s Jeppesen Unit
items.description: Thoma Bravo, L.P. is in advanced talks to buy The Boeing Company ?s Jeppesen navigation unit, according to people familiar with the matter. A deal could be announced later this week, the people said,...

items.title: Buyout firm Thoma Bravo nears deal for Boeing's Jeppesen unit, Bloomberg News reports
items.description: Technology-focused buyout firm Thoma Bravo is in advanced talks to buy Boeing's Jeppesen navigation unit, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter. ...
